page.title: 13LOCAL INDUSTRY:ST.ALBANS
page.content: Just off Hatfield Rd. on the outskirts of St. Albans are three small industrial estates. These are Acrewood Way, Lyon Way and Alban Park. We visited some of the many different companies such as Case, who deal with banks and department stores, Lacre, who manufacture commercial vehicles, and Trumpf, who make machine tools. Some more companies are Kelter Plant, who hire out big machines and tools and Kas Graphics who make and sell printers. There are also a number of other industries at the opposite end of Hatfield Road,near Fleetville. Marconi Instruments make electronic test equipment for communications and for circuit board production. Next to them is Laver's timber yard which has been on that site for 100 years. It is a family business stretching back for six generations.
